45.eng-name: The Book of Oaths (qasamah), Retaliation and Blood Money

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Al-Ash'ath bin sulaim, from his father that a man from among Banu Tha'labah bin Yarbu' said:"I came to the Prophet when he was speaking, and a man said: 'O Messenger of Allah, these are Banu Tha'labah bin Yarbu' who killed so and so.' The Messenger of Allah said: 'No,' meaning no soul is affected by the sin of another

chapter.ara-name: باب هَلْ يُؤْخَذُ أَحَدٌ بِجَرِيرَةِ غَيْرِهِ
chapter.eng-name: Can Anyone Be Blamed For The sin Of Another?
